verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye this \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which I take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* against you, \add even\add* a \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

The \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*; she shall no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*: she is \w forsaken|strong="H5203"\w* upon her \w land|strong="H0127"\w*; \add there is\add* none to raise her \w up|strong="H6965"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; The \w city|strong="H5892"\w* that went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \add by\add* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* shall \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, and that which went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \add by\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* shall \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w*, to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Seek|strong="H1875"\w* ye me, and ye shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*:

But \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* not \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, nor \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, and \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* not to \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*: for \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H1540"\w* go into \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w*, and \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* shall come to \w nought|strong="H0205"\w*.

\w Seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and ye shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; lest he break \w out|strong="H6743"\w* like \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, and \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \add it\add*, and \add there be\add* none to \w quench|strong="H3518"\w* \add it\add* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*.

Ye who \w turn|strong="H2015"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* to \w wormwood|strong="H3939"\w*, and leave \w off|strong="H3240"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*,

\add Seek him\add* that \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* the seven \w stars|strong="H3598"\w* and \w Orion|strong="H3685"\w*, and \w turneth|strong="H2015"\w* the shadow of \w death|strong="H6757"\w* into the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and maketh the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w dark|strong="H2821"\w* with \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: that \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* for the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and poureth them \w out|strong="H8210"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*:

That \w strengtheneth|strong="H1082"\w* the \w spoiled|strong="H7701"\w* against the \w strong|strong="H5794"\w*, so that the \w spoiled|strong="H7701"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against the \w fortress|strong="H4013"\w*.\f + \fr 5.9 \ft spoiled: Heb. spoil\f*

They \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* him that \w rebuketh|strong="H3198"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and they \w abhor|strong="H8581"\w* him that \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H8549"\w*.

\w Forasmuch|strong="H3282"\w* therefore as your \w treading|strong="H1318"\w* \add is\add* upon the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, and ye \w take|strong="H3947"\w* from him \w burdens|strong="H4864"\w* of \w wheat|strong="H1250"\w*: ye have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of hewn \w stone|strong="H1496"\w*, but ye shall not \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in them; ye have \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* \w pleasant|strong="H2531"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, but ye shall not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* of them.\f + \fr 5.11 \ft pleasant…: Heb. vineyards of desire\f*

For I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* your \w manifold|strong="H7227"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* and your \w mighty|strong="H6099"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*: they \w afflict|strong="H6887"\w* the \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, they \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w bribe|strong="H3724"\w*, and they turn \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \add from their right\add*.\f + \fr 5.12 \ft a bribe: or, a ransom\f*
Therefore the \w prudent|strong="H7919"\w* shall keep \w silence|strong="H1826"\w* in that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*; for it \add is\add* an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.

\w Seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and not \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, that ye may \w live|strong="H2421"\w*: and so the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, shall be with you, as ye have \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w Hate|strong="H8130"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and \w establish|strong="H3322"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: it may be that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* will be \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* unto the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.

Therefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* thus; \w Wailing|strong="H4553"\w* \add shall be\add* in all \w streets|strong="H7339"\w*; and they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in all the \w highways|strong="H2351"\w*, \w Alas|strong="H1930"\w*! \w alas|strong="H1930"\w*! and they shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* the \w husbandman|strong="H0406"\w* to \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w*, and such as are \w skilful|strong="H3045"\w* of \w lamentation|strong="H5092"\w* to \w wailing|strong="H4553"\w*.

And in all \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \add shall be\add* \w wailing|strong="H4553"\w*: for I will \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H7130"\w* thee, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto you that \w desire|strong="H0183"\w* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*! to what \w end|strong="H4100"\w* \add is\add* it for you? the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, and not \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.

As if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* did \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, and a \w bear|strong="H1677"\w* \w met|strong="H6293"\w* him; or \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w leaned|strong="H5564"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* on the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, and a \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* \w bit|strong="H5391"\w* him.

\add Shall\add* not the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add be\add* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, and not \w light|strong="H0216"\w*? even very \w dark|strong="H0651"\w*, and no \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* in it?

¶ I \w hate|strong="H8130"\w*, I \w despise|strong="H3988"\w* your feast \w days|strong="H2282"\w*, and I will not \w smell|strong="H7306"\w* in your solemn \w assemblies|strong="H6116"\w*.\f + \fr 5.21 \ft in…: or, your holy days\f*

Though ye \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* me burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and your meat \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*, I will not \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* \add them:\add* neither will I \w regard|strong="H5027"\w* the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* of your fat \w beasts|strong="H4806"\w*.\f + \fr 5.22 \ft peace…: or, thank offerings\f*

Take thou \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from me the \w noise|strong="H1995"\w* of thy \w songs|strong="H7892"\w*; for I will not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w melody|strong="H2172"\w* of thy \w viols|strong="H5035"\w*.

But let \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* run \w down|strong="H1556"\w* as \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* as a \w mighty|strong="H0386"\w* \w stream|strong="H5158"\w*.\f + \fr 5.24 \ft run: Heb. roll\f*

Have ye \w offered|strong="H5066"\w* unto me \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* and \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

But ye have \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H5522"\w* of your \w Moloch|strong="H4428"\w* and \w Chiun|strong="H3594"\w* your \w images|strong="H6754"\w*, the \w star|strong="H3556"\w* of your \w god|strong="H0430"\w*, which ye \w made|strong="H6213"\w* to yourselves.\f + \fr 5.26 \ft the tabernacle…: or, Siccuth your king\f*

Therefore will I cause you to go into \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* \w beyond|strong="H1973"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* The \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.
